title: guhanait-tudi
sahitya:
guhanait-tudi sheidu jagamidil uyyavE agamagizhvuDan sukham eidiDu manamE


anupallavi

  mahimai mighum pazhani malai mElamarnda mAl marugOn pOl bhakti perugavE


caraNam 1    nidam nidam avan padamadaip-paNindiDu shatamadu tAn ena sharaNam pughundiDu
vida vidamAi pudu vindai mighundiDum vaiyaga vAzhvidan maiyalil mayakkAmal
    caraNam 2    aravazhi ninriDum ATralaip-pENuvAi anbinai undan aNiyenap-pUNuvAi
pirarukkukupakAram piriyamAip-purivAi shiruppuDanE shelva sIrellAm peruvAi
